CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: perfect human
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef} is skilled in everything to an unnatural degree. Regardless of the subject, {PAWN_pronoun} has mastered it. In addition, {PAWN_possessive} work ethic is remarkable. {PAWN_pronoun} appears to be the perfect worker.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: occultist
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_pronoun} is deeply knowledgeable of all things related to the void. {PAWN_pronoun} can study unnatural phenomena faster than others and will also teach others when {PAWN_pronoun} gets the chance.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: unnatural healing
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_pronoun} offers to use {PAWN_possessive} healing power to help you.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: shambler overlord
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef}'s body is riddled with corrupt archites. {PAWN_pronoun} can release them at will, creating a cloud of deadlife dust which can reanimate nearby corpses.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: fleshcrafter
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef} claims to be gifted with the dark art of animating dead flesh. {PAWN_pronoun} can turn corpses into hideous fleshbeasts.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: alchemist
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef} claims an extensive knowledge of alchemical practice. {PAWN_pronoun} can, using unknown archotechnological influence, transmute steel into various valuable resources.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: joybringer
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef} is a bringer of joy and serenity whose abilities go beyond mere charisma. {PAWN_pronoun} lifts spirits and inspires others by telling jokes and spreading blissful thoughts.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: death refusal
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: As the former subject of a cultist ritual, {PAWN_nameDef} has the ability to defy death. Black archotechnology courses throughout {PAWN_possessive} body, allowing {PAWN_objective} to self-resurrect. When {PAWN_pronoun} does, {PAWN_possessive} flesh rapidly reforms, replacing missing organs and healing wounds. The process is, however, imperfect.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: body mastery
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: {PAWN_nameDef}'s eyes are pure white. Using local folk knowledge, {PAWN_pronoun} has mastered {PAWN_possessive} metabolic and circadian rhythms. At least, that's what {PAWN_pronoun} claims. {PAWN_nameDef} never sleeps and doesn't need to eat, though in {PAWN_possessive} eyes you see a primal hunger.

CreepJoinerBenefitDef.label: psychic butcher
CreepJoinerBenefitDef.letterExtra: Animals are skittish around {PAWN_nameDef}. {PAWN_pronoun} has the unnatural power to deform the flesh of living creatures, causing them to erupt into piles of twisted meat. {PAWN_nameDef} claims to use {PAWN_possessive} gift only to butcher animals - but it's clear {PAWN_pronoun} could just as easily butcher a person.
